lead_paragraph: A U.S. Bankruptcy judge said he will rule Friday on a request to end pension contributions by the owner of the Trump Taj Mahal casino, which said it will close its Atlantic City hotel if it cannot shed some obligations to unions.

headline.main: Judge to Rule Friday on Pensions at Atlantic City Trump Casino
headline.print_headline: Judge to Rule Friday on Pensions at Atlantic City Trump Casino
